entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or snow this morning and early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
